title: Epitaph for Nicarin
support: No description is preserved, although a plaque is most likely.

provenanceFound._: Recorded by Panvinus and Gualtherus, the former seemingly derived from Agustin, the latter from Palermitan antiquarians, and therefore attested in Sicily in the 16th century, and recorded by both as being found in Termini Imerese
